Review Name: Hated it! Review Description: Writing this review after using AC for 3 months. I bought this 5 star AC to save on electricity bill but as I can see my bill is more than 3 times of what I used to get. This is rediculous then why should we invest such a big amount for 5 star AC if the bill is coming like it is for 3 star.
